data: This component allows players to determine the herd size of animals.

data.Name: event
data.Description: This is an event that can be triggered from spawning

data.Name: event_skip_count
data.Description: This is the number of mobs spawned before the specified event is triggered

data.Name: max_size
data.Description: This is the maximum number of mobs that spawn in a herd

data.Name: min_size
data.Description: This is the minimum number of mobs that spawn in a herd
